LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10.label: Thresh Momi into Brown rice (10)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outer hull.

LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice50.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outer hull.
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice10.label: Threshing Momi into Glutinous rice (10)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice10.description: Drain rice in the mortar and divide it into Glutinous rice and Outer hull.
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice50.label: Thresh Momi into Glutinous rice (50)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice50.description: Drain rice in the mortar and divide it into Glutinous rice and Outer hull.。
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10_1.label: Separate Momi into Brown rice (10)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10_1.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outer hull.\nBy doing it gently you can earn a small amount of White rice.
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice50_2.label: Separate Momi into Brown rice (50)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice50_2.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outer hull.\nBy doing it gently you can earn a small amount of White rice.
